ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lidlabl.l | |- L = ( LIdeal ` R ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ressbas | |- ( U e. L -> ( U i^i ( Base ` R ) ) = ( Base ` I ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_lidlss | |- ( U e. L -> U C_ ( Base ` R ) ) |

| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( U e. L -> ( Base ` I ) = U ) |
